  • Constructor Details

    • Fire

      public Fire​(int x, int y, int w, int h, int speed, double direction, java.lang.String name, int frames)
      instantiates an fire element
      Parameters:
      x - the starting x coordinate
      y - the starting y coordinate
      w - the width of the ice image
      h - the height of the ice image
      frames - The number of frames the animation has
      name - name of the file path
      direction - direction of the element
      speed - the speed of the object
